instructions.title: Select {validatorNumber} dApps
instructions.description: It is recommended that you select {validatorNumber} dApp to optimize your staking rewards

instructions.title: Unstake and withdraw
instructions.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw after a period of {periodNumb}. Keep in mind that these actions are not automated and will incur network fees

instructions.title: Keep your transferable balance
instructions.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, reward claiming, unstaking and withdrawals

instructions.title: Claim your rewards
instructions.description: Your staking rewards will be paid out every {paidOut} hour. Make sure to claim them manually

instructions.title: Track your stake
instructions.description: Keep an eye on your stake periodically, as rewards and staking status can fluctuate over time

instructions.title: Receive {derivative}
instructions.description: You will receive {derivative} as a representation of your supplied {inputToken}

instructions.title: Withdraw anytime
instructions.description: Once supplied, your funds will be locked. Withdraw your funds anytime with a fee

instructions.title: Keep your transferable balance
instructions.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

instructions.title: Check your {derivative}
instructions.description: The amount of {derivative} doesn’t increase over time, only its value in {inputToken} does. This means that by the time you decide to withdraw {inputToken} from {derivative}, your {derivative} should be worth more than your originally supplied {inputToken}

instructions.title: Track your APY
instructions.description: Keep an eye on your supply as APY can fluctuate over time. APY fluctuation is determined by the protocol beyond SubWallet’s control

instructions.title: Receive {derivative}
instructions.description: You will receive {derivative} as a representation of your staked {inputToken}

instructions.title: Unstake and withdraw
instructions.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw immediately with a higher fee or wait up to {periodNumb} before withdrawing with a lower fee

instructions.title: Keep your transferable balance
instructions.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

instructions.title: Check your {derivative}
instructions.description: The amount of {derivative} doesn’t increase over time, only its value in {inputToken} does. This means that by the time you decide to withdraw {inputToken} from {derivative}, your {derivative} should be worth more than your originally staked {inputToken}

instructions.title: Track your APY
instructions.description: Keep an eye on your stake as APY can fluctuate over time. APY fluctuation is determined by the protocol beyond SubWallet’s control

instructions.title: Select {validatorNumber} {validatorType}
instructions.description: It is recommended that you select {validatorNumber} {validatorType} to optimize your staking rewards

instructions.title: Unstake and withdraw
instructions.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw after a period of {periodNumb}. Keep in mind that these actions are not automated and will incur network fees

instructions.title: Keep your transferable balance
instructions.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

instructions.title: Check your rewards
instructions.description: Your staking rewards will be paid out every {paidOut} hour and will be automatically compounded to your stake

instructions.title: Manage your stake
instructions.description: You need to monitor your stake constantly and change {validatorType} when needed as staking status can fluctuate over time

instructions.title: Select active pool
instructions.description: It is recommended that you select an active pool with the Earning status to earn staking rewards

instructions.title: Unstake and withdraw
instructions.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw after a period of {periodNumb}. Keep in mind that these actions are not automated and will incur network fees

instructions.title: Keep your transferable balance
instructions.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

instructions.title: Claim your rewards
instructions.description: Your staking rewards will be paid out every {paidOut} hour. Make sure to claim them manually

instructions.title: Track your stake
instructions.description: Keep an eye on your stake periodically, as rewards and staking status can fluctuate over time

instructions.title: Wait time
instructions.description: Once unstaked, your funds will become available for withdrawal after {unBondedTime}

instructions.title: No rewards
instructions.description: During the unstaking period of {unBondedTime}, your tokens produce no rewards

instructions.title: Manual withdrawal
instructions.description: Keep in mind that you need to withdraw manually after the wait time is over

title: $9,500 pool prize in VARA with Vara Kick-to-Airdrop campaign

instructions.title: Terms and Conditions
instructions.description:
Participants can receive airdrops through a raffle system. Raffle entries can be purchased using NPS at an exchange rate of 30,000 NPS for 1 raffle entry.
After a snapshot, the system will calculate and allocate the number of raffle entries purchased with NPS for each participant.
The detailed mechanism is as follows

instructions.title: Based on Vara Football Leaderboard
instructions.description: The top 400 players on the leaderboard will have the right to purchase raffle entries with NPS. Higher rankings will allow for more raffle entries.

instructions.title: Based on Vara Onchain Check-In Leaderboard
instructions.description: The top 50 participants will have the right to purchase raffle entries with NPS.

instructions.title: Based on Invite Leaderboard
instructions.description: The top 50 participants will have the right to purchase raffle entries with NPS. The more friends invited, the more raffle entries can be purchased.

instructions.title: Social Event Activities
instructions.description: Participate in social activities to earn additional raffle entries with NPS.

instructions.title: Notes
instructions.description: Each raffle entry guarantees a 100% chance of winning VARA tokens with a minimum value of $5. The number of raffle entries a player can obtain is unlimited.

instructions.title: Disclaimer
instructions.description: We're responsible for listing campaigns only. The decision to participate is entirely up to you. So, make sure to do your own research!
